definition: "to eat" or "food" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 184)
hungry and thirsty/(fig.) to crave (knowledge, love etc)
to hunger for sth (idiom); eagerly/to long for sth
beset by hunger and cold (idiom)/starving and freezing/in desperate poverty
when hungry, you can't pick what you eat (idiom); beggars can't be choosers/When matters are urgent, don't spend time choosing alternatives.
lit. to allay one's hunger using a picture of a cake/to feed on illusions (idiom)
The well-fed cannot know how the starving suffer (idiom).
pinyin: bao3 han4 bu4 zhi1 e4 han4 ji1

definition: to allay one's hunger and slake one's thirst (idiom)
to bury one's head in the sand (idiom)
The well-fed cannot know how the starving suffer (idiom).
pinyin: bao3 ren2 bu4 zhi1 e4 ren2 ji1

sentences.english: Securinega particular, cicada Liao more bitter, with suction drinking dew into hunger.
sentences.chinese: 葉底蟬蟟尤更苦，吸風飲露伴入飢。

sentences.english: Because its cardinal symptoms are the good food easy hunger.
sentences.chinese: 因其主要症狀爲好食易飢。

sentences.english: Hong Taiji then proceeded in 1636 to invade Korea for the second time.
sentences.chinese: 閎臺飢接着在1636年入侵朝鮮進行了第二次。

sentences.english: Or because of bowel verminosis is causedMorpheusUnwell, or because cross be hungry, pass full etc.
sentences.chinese: 或因腸寄生蟲病引起睡眠不適，或因過飢過飽等等。

sentences.english: The people in the flooded area are suffering (from) cold and hunger.
sentences.chinese: 發生洪水地區的人們正忍飢挨凍。

definition: to sympathize/to pity/to feel compassion for
